maqras.text: sillo ingan-eun bin-yaghage changjodoeeossnola
geuege nappeun geos-i seuchimyeon keuge geunsimhago
geuege joh-eun geos-i seuchimyeon insaeghadeola
geuleona yebae deulineun jadeul-eun ye-oela
geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui yebaee iss-eo bujileonhan jadeul-imyeo
geudeul-ui jaesan-e iljeonghan mogs-i issneun jadeul-ini
gugeolhaneun gananhan jawa gugeolhaji anhneun gananhan jaleul wiham-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun simpan-ui nal-eul mid-eumyeo
geudeul junim-ui beol-e daehayeo sillo geunsimhaneun jadeul-ila
sillo geudeul junim-ui beol-ilan anjeonhae hal su eobsneun geos-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo jasin-ui sungyeol-eul jikineun jadeul-ila
geuleona geudeul-ui baeujana geudeul-ui oleunson-i soyuhan ja(noye)e gwanhayeoneun geudeul-i chaegmangbadji anhnola
geuleondedo geu ioeui geos-eul domohaneun jadeul-i issdamyeon jeodeul-eun sillo gyeong-gyeleul neom-eun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui sutagmulgwa gyeyag-eul jung-yohasineun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo gudgeonhi geudeul-ui jeung-eon-eul seoneun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui yebaeleul jikim-e kkujunhadeola
geudeul-eun cheongug-e iss-eul myeong-yeloun jadeul-ila
bulsinhan jadeul-i geudae geuncheoeseo seoduleuni i eojjidoen il-inga
oleunjjoggwa oenjjog-eseo (geudeul-eun) gunjibhayeo issdeola
geudeul jung-ui modeun iga gippeum-ui cheongug-eulo ibseongdoegil huimanghandan mal-inga
geuleohji anhnola. sillo naneun, geudeul-i algo issneun geos-eulobuteo geudeul-eul changjohayeossnola
geulihayeo naega dongjjogdeulgwa seojjogdeul-ui junim-eul geolgo maengsehani jinsillo naneun neunglyeog-eul gajin jala
naneun geudeulboda deo hullyunghan jonjaelo daechehal neunglyeog-eul jinyeoss-euni geu nugudo naleul apseogal su eobsnola
geuleoni geudaeneun geudeul-eul noh-adula ; geudeul-eun nodag-imyeo noldaga gyeolgug geudeul-ui yagsogbad-eun nal-eul majdagtteulige doel geos-ila
geunal geudeul-eun machi usang jedan-eulo bunjuhi idonghaneun geoscheoleom geuleohge myojieseo jaeppalli geol-eo naol geos-ila
geudeul-ui nun-eun tteolgueojil geos-imyeo gul-yog-i geudeul-eul deopchil geos-ini jeo nal-eun geudeul-i yagsogbaddeon geunal-ila
sillo naneun noaleul geuui salamdeul-ege bonaessnola : “geudaeui salamdeul-ege gotongseuleoun beol-i chaj-aogi jeon-e geudaeneun geudeul-ege gyeong-gohala”
geuga malhagil “naui salamdeul-iyeo. sillo naneun geudaedeul-eul wihan myeongbaeghan gyeong-gojala”
“geudaedeul-eun hananim-eul gyeongbaehago geubun-eul gyeong-oehamyeo naleul ttaleula”

“geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo geudaedeul-eul wihae geudaedeul-ui joeleul yongseohayeo jusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul jijeongdoen gihankkaji neujchueo jusil geos-ila. geudaedeul-i andamyeon sillo hananim-ui gihan, geugeos-i dolaehaess-eul ttaeneun neujchueojiji anhnola”
geuga malhagil “jeoui junim, sillo jeoneun jeoui salamdeul-eul bamnaj-eulo bulleossseubnida”
“geuleona jeoui buleum-eun ojig geudeul-ui hoepiman-eul jeung-gasikyeoss-eul ppun-ibnida”

“dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul yongseohae jusigi wihae jega geudeul-eul buleul ttaemada geudeul-eun songalag-eul gwie daego jasin-ui os-eulo mom-eul deop-eo ssamyeo gyesoghaeseo geoman-eul tteol-eossseubnida”
“geu hu sillo jeoneun geudeul-eul solinaeeo bulleossseubnida”
“geu hu sillo jeoneun geudeul-ege gongpyohagido hago, bimilseule sogongeolimyeo geudeul-ege malhagido hayeossseubnida”
“geulihayeo jega malhayeossseubnida : ‘geudaedeul-eun geudaedeul junim-ege yongseoleul guhala. sillo geubunkkeseoneun gajang neogeuleoi yongseohasineun bun-idoda' ”
‘geulihamyeon geubunkkeseo geudaedeul wilo julgichan bileul bonaejusil geos-ila’
‘geuligo geudaedeul-ege jaesangwa jason-eul neullyeojusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul wihae jeong-won-eul dusil geos-imyeo geudaedeul-eul wihae gang-eul dusil geos-ila’
‘geudaedeul-eun hananim-ui wieom-eul gaeuichi anh-euni i eojjidoen il-inga?’
‘sillo geubunkkeseoneun jeomjinjeog-eulo geudaedeul-eul changjohasyeossnola’
‘hananimkkeseo eotteohge ilgob gaeui haneul-eul cheungcheung-i changjohasyeossneunji geudaedeul-eun alji moshaneunga?’
‘geubunkkeseoneun dal-eul geu(haneul) an-e bich-eulo dusyeoss-eumyeo taeyang-eul deungbullo dusyeossnola’
‘hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul heulg-eulobuteo jalanage hasyeossnola’
‘geu hu geubunkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul geugos(heulg)eulo dol-agage hasigo geudaedeul-eul kkeonaesil geos-ila’
‘hananimkkeseoneun geudaedeul-eul wihae daejileul yungdan-eulo dusyeossnola’
‘geudaedeul-i geu an-eseo neolb-eun gil-eul deunadeul su issdolog ham-ila’
noaga malhagil “jeoui junim. sillo geudeul-eun jeoege bulboghayeoss-eumyeo geudeul-eun, jasin-ui jaesangwa jasig-eulosseo ojig jasin-ege sonsilman-eul jeung-gasikineun jaleul ttalassseubnida”
“geuligo geudeul-eun maeu keodalan chaeglyag-eul kkumyeossseubnida”
“geuligo geudeul-eun malhaessseubnida : ‘geudaedeul-eun jeoldae geudaedeul-ui usang-eul pogihaji malmyeo jeoldae wasdeuwa suwa-euwa yagusseuwa yaukkeuwa naseuleuleul pogihaji malla’
“sillo geudeul-eun manh-eun ideul-eul banghwangke hayeossseubnida. dangsinkkeseoneun budanghan jadeul-ege ojig banghwangman-eul deohae jusibsio”
geudeul-ui joelo malmiam-a geudeul-eun igsahayeossgo geu hu bul sog-eulo deul-eogage doeeoss-euni geudeul-eun hananim-i anin geudeul-eul wihan jolyeogjadeul(usangdeul)eul balgyeonhaji moshayeossnola
noaga malhagil "jeoui junim. bulsinjadeul jung-e eotteon ingando jigusang-e naebeolyeoduji masibsio
“sillo dangsinkkeseo geudeul-eul naebeolyeodusindamyeon geudeul-eun dangsin-ui jongbogdeul-eul banghwangke hal geos-imyeo geudeul-eun ojig saaghan bulsinjaman nah-eul geos-ibnida”

“jeoui junim. jeoleul yongseohayeo jusigo jeoui bumonimgwa, midneun jaloseo jeoui jib-e deul-eowassdeon jawa, midneun namseongdeulgwa midneun yeoseongdeul-eul yongseohayeo jusibsio. geuligo budanghan jadeul-egeneun ojig pagoeman-eul deohae jusibsio”
